item.title: Docsumo
item.content:
### Junior Backend Engineer - [Docsumo](https://www.docsumo.com/) **June 2024 - Present**
- Maintaining and improving APIs for document extraction - Research and Experimentation for better table extraction from documents
### Python Intern - [Docsumo](https://www.docsumo.com/) **November 2023 - June 2024**
- Developed fraud detection algorithms for bank statement analysis. - Built analytics features for banking clients. - Collaborated with the R&D team to enhance security features.

item.title: Solar Labs
item.content:
### Backend Developer Intern - [The Solar Labs](https://www.thesolarlabs.com/) **July 2022 - April 2023**
- Developed REST APIs using Python and Django/DRF. - Worked on backend services and database optimization. - Utilized Azure Pipelines for continuous integration and deployment.

item.title: GeeksForGeeks
item.content:
### Technical Content Writer - [GeeksForGeeks](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/) **June 2021 - September 2021**
- Authored 60+ technical articles on topics like shell scripting, Linux, and web development. - Contributed to tutorials and educational resources for the programming community.
